summary: The term ecosystem relates to both biological contexts and innovative, decentralized organizational structures. It highlights the importance of regenerative design, sustainability, and thriving interconnected networks in space and time. These identifiers mark a move from hierarchical systems to more organic and resilient frameworks, focusing on renewal and sustainability across various disciplines.
excerpt: Ecosystem signifies entities that adapt over space and time, emphasizing organic, regenerative structures and sustainability aimed at communities and environments.
